thread.title: Stream 20 SXSW 2017 Shorts and Music Videos Right Now
thread.title_full: Stream 20 SXSW 2017 Shorts and Music Videos Right Now

author: Christopher Boone
title: Stream 20 SXSW 2017 Shorts and Music Videos Right Now
text:
Stream 20 SXSW 2017 Shorts and Music Videos Right Now Vimeo's SXSW Channel lets you stream shorts and music videos like you're at the festival. 
Can't make it to Austin for SXSW this year? In addition to our coverage from the heart of the film festival, check out Vimeo's Streaming @ SXSW 2017 channel to watch shorts and music videos from this year's festival. 
Here's a small taste of what you'll find, Tame Impala's music video The Less I Know The Better , produced and directed by CANADA (Note: this video is rated "Mature" on Vimeo, and is probably NSFW). 
While most of the selections come from the music video and narrative shorts sections of the festival, Vimeo's Streaming @ SXSW 2017 channel also features powerful documentaries, like REFUGE , directed by Matthew K. Firpo . 
To watch all 20 videos from SXSW 2017, head on over to the Streaming @ SXSW 2017 channel on Vimeo.
